its there it just depends on what you are into. Debate clubs, psychology clubs, Political science and etc.
If you a person that is bound and determined then this school and any school is right for you. All in all if you are not focused in your work you will not succeed and fail

Hang out with friends on the weekends and socialize at any of the local bars. Such as 502, and The Juke Box
Joplin has several different types of restaurants to soothe your taste buds. Most of the restaurants are located on Rangeline Rd and the rest of them are located on Maiden lane
I currently taking online courses and I don't stay on campus.

MSSU is a accredited university located in SW Missouri. You can enjoy, shopping that is within two miles from the university, attending clubs for night life to get a break from your school work. Everything that you made need or want is located on the same street as the school located at.

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I can't say MSSU was my first choice and I am planning on transferring. However, it has been nice staying home for an extra year. So far, my teachers have been pleasant and willing to help and the overall atmosphere is comfortable. Am learning a lot Being a freshman, some of my classes so far have been common sense type classes (e.g. Oral Communication and the freshman orientation class), but classes that had some real substance (e.g. Sociology, Newswriting, American Literature) were great classes and I did feel like I was learning. Login to rate or flag the reviews Austin from Seneca, MO 01/24/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 41 Categories Comments Campus Safety by far the safest campus in missouri. we have our own police force on campus!
